Features¶

Here’s what our application features!

  • An easy-to-use User Interface

We want our application to be simple as possible so that people of all ages are able to use it.

  • Share with friends

What’s the point of using our application if you can’t share with friends? Let’s make things simple and share it! Sharing is caring after all!

Team 4 Slay the Python
